description:
Bill Skarsgård and FKA Twigs are set to star in an all-new interpretation of The Crow. Now, as you can see below, a brand-new trailer for The Crow has been revealed which features Skarsgård as the titular character. The first look at Skarsgård in the remake was released in a series of photos which received [...]

The post First Trailer Released For ‘The Crow’ Remake With Bill Skarsgård appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: First Trailer Released For ‘The Crow’ Remake With Bill Skarsgård

description:
The Twilight franchise dominated the beginning years of the 2000’s. The first novel of the same name, written by Stephenie Meyer, was published in 2005. It was followed by three direct sequels in 2006, 2007, and 2008 in addition to a series of film adaptations each year from 2008 to 2012. Now it looks like [...]

title: ‘Twilight’ Reboot Gets A Big Update
